show_app_open.description: Enable/disable App Open ads (currently using Interstitial fallback)

app_wide_ad_app_open_ad.description: Global toggle for App Open ads across the entire application

shared_content_native_above_info.description: Show high-CTR Native ad above asset info for better integration

shared_content_banner_above_open_btn.description: Show Adaptive Banner ad above open button

shared_content_native_below_open_btn.description: Show Native ad below open button

shared_content_use_rewarded_interstitial.description: Use high-earning Rewarded Interstitial instead of standard interstitial when opening asset

shared_content_ad_asset_open.description: Show ad when opening an asset

shared_content_ad_link_open_rewarded.description: Use Rewarded Interstitial for opening a link asset

shared_content_ad_open_every_time.description: Frequency for showing open ad: 0=Never, 1=Every time, N=Every 1st and (N+1)th time

shared_content_ad_sub_asset_open.description: Show ad when opening sub-elements of an asset

shared_content_ad_open_asset_open_again_.description: Cooldown time in seconds before showing ad again for the same asset

shared_folder_native_top.description: Show Native ad at the top of shared folder list

shared_folder_banner_bottom.description: Show Adaptive Banner ad at the bottom of shared folder list

shared_folder_ad_sub_asset_open.description: Show ad when opening sub-elements (files/folders) within a shared folder

shared_folder_ad_link_open_rewarded.description: Use Rewarded Interstitial for opening a link within a shared folder

shared_folder_ad_open_again_time.description: Cooldown time in seconds before showing ad again for the same sub-asset

history_banner_top.description: Show Adaptive Banner at the top of history list

history_native_bottom.description: Show premium Native ad at the bottom of history list

history_ad_open_assets.description: Show ad when opening an asset from history

history_ad_link_open_rewarded.description: Use Rewarded Interstitial for opening a link from history

history_ad_open_every_time.description: Frequency for showing history open ad: 0=Never, 1=Every time, N=Every 1st and (N+1)th time

history_ad_open_again_time.description: Cooldown time in seconds before showing ad again for the same history asset

history_ad_open_sub_elements.description: Show ad when opening sub-elements from history items

show_exit_interstitial.description: Show Interstitial ad when user presses back/exit button

show_exit_native.description: Show Native ad in exit confirmation dialog

assets_banner_top.description: Show Adaptive Banner at top of My Assets screen

assets_native_bottom.description: Show high-CTR Adaptive Banner ad at bottom of My Assets screen

webview_ad_intervals.description: Comma-separated list of seconds to show interstitial ads

webview_ad_repeat_interval.description: Repeat interval in seconds for webview ads

id_app_open.description: Ad ID for Splash screen (Using Interstitial replacement)

id_adaptive_banner.description: AdManager Adaptive Banner Ad Unit ID

id_rewarded_interstitial.description: AdManager Rewarded Interstitial Ad Unit ID

id_native_video.description: AdManager Native Video Ad Unit ID

rewarded_limit_1min.description: Maximum rewarded ads allowed per 1 minute

rewarded_limit_5min.description: Maximum rewarded ads allowed per 5 minutes

interstitial_limit_1min.description: Maximum interstitial ads allowed per 1 minute

interstitial_limit_5min.description: Maximum interstitial ads allowed per 5 minutes

defaultValue.value:
[
  {"type": "ad_native_video", "id": "hero_video", "visible": true},
  {"type": "section", "id": "supers", "visible": true},
  {"type": "ad_native", "id": "mid_native", "visible": true},
  {"type": "section", "id": "apps", "visible": true},
  {"type": "section", "id": "games", "visible": true},
  {"type": "ad_banner", "id": "bottom_banner", "visible": true},
  {"type": "section", "id": "content", "visible": true}
]

home_layout_config.description: JSON configuration for Home Screen layout
